organizableplayscreens:entry.deleteEntry: Are you sure you want to delete this %s?
'%s' will be lost forever! (A long time!)
organizableplayscreens:folder.moveBack: Move the selected entry back to the previous folder.
organizableplayscreens:folder.moveInto: Move the selected entry into this folder.
organizableplayscreens:folder.deleteMult: '%s' and all contents of the folder will be lost forever! (A long time!)
organizableplayscreens:folder.deleteSing:
'%s' will be lost forever! (A long time!)
Folders and worlds inside will be put in the current folder.
